thread.title: Census Bureau to Launch New Web Application to Transform How Small Business Owners Access Data
thread.title_full: Census Bureau to Launch New Web Application to Transform How Small Business Owners Access Data

author: admin
title: Census Bureau to Launch New Web Application to Transform How Small Business Owners Access Data
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: U.S. Census Bureau 
WASHINGTON, Sept. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire-USNewswire/ -- The following is being released by the U.S. Census Bureau: 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20110428/DC91889LOGO 
What: The U.S. Census Bureau will host a live demonstration to debut its newest data tool, the Census Business Builder: Small Business Edition at the America's Small Business Development Centers 35th Annual Conference in San Francisco . Over the past year, Census Bureau staff have worked with and listened to feedback from small business owners, trade associations and government agencies to provide them with a powerful tool that combines demographic and economic data to guide their research into opening a new business or expanding an existing one. In addition to a live demonstration of the tool, Census Bureau presenters will provide an overview of key demographic and economic data that entrepreneurs can use. 
Census Business Builder provides business owners and entrepreneurs with data for their business research. Census Business Builder: Small Business Edition provides useful data - from the American Community Survey, Economic Census, County Business Patterns and several other data sets - in an interactive map, along with printable reports and charts. 
A media availability will follow the presentation. Media may also visit the Census Bureau's booth (booth 202) during the conference to see a demonstration of the tool. 
When: Wednesday, Sept. 9, 2015 3:45 p.m. to 5:15 p.m. (PDT) 
Where: America's Small Business Development Centers Conference San Francisco Marriott Marquis
